actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to exempt loans and mortgages insured under title I or II of the National Housing Act from usury provisions of State constitution or statutes.

summary.text: Exempts from State usury laws loans and mortgages insured under the mortgage insurance and housing renovation and modernization programs of the National Housing Act. Declares that such exemption shall apply until the effective date of State legislation limiting the amount of interest on such loans and mortgages.

titles.title: A bill to exempt loans and mortgages insured under title I or II of the National Housing Act from usury provisions of State constitution or statutes.
